item.title: Fully rounded canvas of an image
item.description: 1// create new image element 2const image = new Image(); 3image.src = "/images/sample.jpg"; 4 5// create canvas element 6const canvas = document.createElement("canvas"); 7 8// set width and height of the canvas 9canvas.width = 100; 10canvas.height = 100; 11 12// context 13let ctx = canvas.getContext("2d"); 14 15// background purpose 16ctx.fillStyle = "white"; 17ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); 18ctx.save(); 19 20// cropping 21ctx.beginPath(); 22ctx.arc(50, 50, 50, 0, Math.PI * 2, true); 23ctx.closePath(); 24ctx.

item.title: Get base64 from URL
item.description: 1async function getBase64FromUrl(URL) { 2 const data = await fetch(URL); 3 const blob = await data.blob(); 4 return new Promise((resolve) => { 5 const reader = new FileReader(); 6 reader.readAsDataURL(blob); 7 reader.onloadend = () => { 8 const base64data = reader.result; 9 resolve(base64data); 10 }; 11 }); 12};
